proposals.title: Predict Total Rice Exports to Bangladesh Using Production Metrics
proposals.problem_statement: Predict annual rice export quantities to Bangladesh using Indian production data (area, yield, and total production) for Rice. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness for 2020-21 to 2024-25, with critical features (Production-2020-21 to Production-2024-25) having 100% non-null values. Export quantity targets for 2020-21 and 2021-22 meet completeness requirements.

join_plan.notes: Join on implicit year alignment between production data (2020-21 to 2024-25) and export data (2020-21 to 2024-25). Aggregate rice varieties in export data to match crop-level production data.

transform_ideas: Aggregate rice variety exports to total quantity per year
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop 2023-24 export data (62.5% null) and impute missing 2022-23 values using forward-fill

proposals.validation_plan: Time-based split: Train on 2020-21 to 2022-23, validate on 2024-25. Use R² and MAE metrics for regression evaluation.
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% non-null values in all features/targets
Confirm INR currency preference for monetary features
expected_outputs: Regression model predicting export quantity from production metrics
Correlation matrix between production features and exports
Time series plot of actual vs predicted exports

proposals.title: Forecast Regional Rice Production Using Area and Yield Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Predict annual rice production across Indian agricultural seasons (Kharif/Rabi) using cultivated area and yield trends. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness for 2020-21 to 2024-25, with critical features (Area, Yield) having 100% completeness in recent years.

join_plan.notes: Join on Crop and Season columns, aligning area data (2015-16 to 2024-25) with production/yield data (2020-21 to 2024-25). Filter to overlapping years (2020-21+) for complete data.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Exclude pre-2020-21 records where target has >35% nulls

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation using rolling window (2020-21 to 2024-25), holding out most recent year for final evaluation
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% non-null in all feature columns
Confirm no multicollinearity between area and yield features

proposals.title: Forecast Future Crop-Specific Cultivated Area Using Historical Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Predict annual cultivated area for major crops across seasons using 10-year historical trends. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness with 2015-25 time series coverage. Focus on Kharif/Rabi season patterns and crop-specific area dynamics.

join_plan.notes: No external joins required - all temporal features exist within single dataset

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill with crop-season specific means for <5% missing values

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 3-year rolling windows (2015-22 train, 2023-25 test)

excluded_columns.reason: Used as baseline feature rather than predictive target
